response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality, innovation, and unparalleled performance. Given its unique features and the time, effort, and resources we've dedicated to its creation, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering all these factors, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for excellence. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
